title: 274. Andy & DJ CTI: Brooklyn Subway Shooter, Transgender Police In UK & BLM's Mansion
itunes:title: 274. Andy & DJ CTI: Brooklyn Subway Shooter, Transgender Police In UK & BLM's Mansion
description: In today's episode, Andy & DJ discuss the unorthodox Brooklyn subway shooting that resulted in multiple injuries, transgender police in the UK being permitted to strip-search biological female suspects, and BLM refusing to apologize for purchasing a multimillion-dollar mansion using donor funds.
content:encoded: In today's episode, Andy & DJ discuss the unorthodox Brooklyn subway shooting that resulted in multiple injuries, transgender police in the UK being permitted to strip-search biological female suspects, and BLM refusing to apologize for purchasing a multimillion-dollar mansion using donor funds.
